channel.title: business on Anyfactor's blog
channel.description: Recent content in business on Anyfactor's blog

item.title: Workplace culture the hidden JD
item.description: I am that weird guy who asks random questions to strangers. I recently had the opporunity to talk with a Japenese medium size business owner in a public transport. I always wanted to ask a question to a Japanese business owner, and I finally did. Me: I understand the idea of “Japanese humbleness,” but waht if I don’t want to clean the toilet and the surrounding area. He: Well, if all the employees are doing that, including the president, you should as well. Me: I understand that, but if I am hired as an accountant and people have already cleaned the toilet 3 times, what is the value in this?

item.title: Business programming hybrid roles: The best of both world
item.description: Any role that has a direct business goal that doesn’t involve full time programming to build the product.

item.title: Do modern hosting services have a sustainable business model?
item.description: There are no hosting company offers a VPS for free. Hosting anything on the web should atleast have some costs associated with them. But why are there free hosting services?
